ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So which of your Lord's blessings do you both then deny?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Which of the favours of your Lord will you then deny?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Which of the powers of your Lord, will you twain – you men and jinn – then deny?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Jinn and mankind) - which of the favors of your Lord do you then deny?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So O men and jinns! Which favour of your Lord will you deny?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then which of the blessings of your Lord will you both deny
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Which then of the bounties of your Lord will you deny?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O which of your Lord's bounties will you and you deny?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Which is it, of the favours of your Lord, that ye deny?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Which of your Lord's wonders would you deny?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Which, then, of the benefits of your Lord will ye twain belie?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So which of your Lord’s bounties will you both deny?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then which of the Blessings of your Lord will you both (jinns and men) deny?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Which favors of your Lord will you both belie?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So which of your Lord’s marvels will you deny?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [55:42] So which of your Lord’s favours will you deny?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Which is it, of the favours of your Lord, that ye deny?)
